page.title: 02Longwick
page.content: The population of Longwick is about l200. Not many people work in Longwick itself, as it is mainly a farming community, but it provides a pleasant place to live for people who work in the Aylesbury and High Wycombe area, or even, with the easy access to Princes Risborough station, for commuters to London. The village is about two kilometres long with three pubs. Some farms access direct on to the main road through the village. The one combined shop and post office provides a meeting place for the village where pensions and allowances are able to be collected, and which gives a gathering place for the local news and views and enables a caring eye to be kept on the local old people. Daily necessities can also be bought here.
